com.raylabz.firestorm

Class FirestormFilterable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raylabz.firestorm.FirestormFilterable<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of objects this FirestormFilterable is able to interact with.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filterable<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransactionFilterable

    public class FirestormFilterable<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filterable<T>
    An object that enables quick use of Firestore filters without using additional DocumentReferences.

    • Field Summary
